sense.def:
Kdor je
mad
, je duševno bolan in se zato vede nenavadno.

seg.quote: She was married to a man who'd gone mad.
...the terrible madness that overtook the king.

sense.def:
Kdor je
mad
, dela ali govori stvari, ki se ljudem zdijo zelo nespametne ali nesmiselne.

seg.quote: They think I am mad to live in such a place.
It is madness for them to remain unarmed.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
mad
opisujemo tudi divje, neobvladano vedenje.

seg.quote: I was dashing around in the usual mad panic.
For years he's been mad about opera.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
is driving someone mad
ali
will drive someone mad
, tistega človeka zelo jezi.

seg.quote: These blinking kids will drive me mad.
They were still arguing like mad.
